hours_text:
# PLAN A VISIT

Whether you’re a history enthusiast, a student eager to learn, or a family seeking a memorable outing, the Sumter Museum welcomes you. From the Revolutionary War legacy of Thomas Sumter to the cultural heritage of our local communities, our exhibits offer a compelling journey through time. Immerse yourself in stories of resilience, innovation, and cultural diversity that continue to shape our identity. Engage with history through our events, educational programs, and guided tours designed for all ages and interests.

[Daily Admission Tickets](https://www.sumtermuseum.org/faq/)

[Event Tickets](https://sumtercountymuseum.app.neoncrm.com/nx/portal/neonevents/events?path=%2Fportal%2Fevents)

collections_text:
# WHERE SUMTER’S  
PAST AND FUTURE MEET

[PLAN YOUR VISIT](https://www.sumtermuseum.org/visit/)

[](https://www.sumtermuseum.org/visit/exhibits/)

EXHIBITS

[](https://www.sumtermuseum.org/events/)

EVENTS

[](https://www.sumtermuseum.org/visit/education/)

EDUCATION

## Welcome to Sumter Museum

Discover the stories where Sumter’s Past and future meet. At the Sumter Museum, our mission is to explore historical experiences through programs and exhibits that allow all of us to inform and shape our future. Through dynamic exhibitions and interactive programs, we aim to foster a deeper understanding of our shared heritage and its impact on our world today. By exploring the challenges and triumphs of the past, we empower ourselves to shape a better future together.

## BUILD A HOME FOR HISTORY

## SUMTER MUSEUM’S NEXT CHAPTER

**Sumter Military Museum, Where Uncommon Patriotism lives. **Honoring Sumter’s veterans through every uniform, every story, every sacrifice.

Build a Home for History is about more than a construction expansion project. It is about creating a lasting home for remembrance, education, and reflection—one that ensures Sumter’s military legacy remains accessible, relevant, and respected for generations to come.

[LEARN MORE](https://www.sumtermuseum.org/build-a-home/)

## BUILD A HOME FOR HISTORY
